section.title: Formatting expectations
section.p: When present, the content of the short description component is displayed as the first paragraph of a topic. It may also be used for other purposes, such as link previews and summaries.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: Processors SHOULD render the content of the short description component as the initial paragraph of a topic

section.title: XDITA example
section.p: The following example demonstrates the use of superscript in an XDITA topic.
section.pre:
Franchise Requirements

Franchised restaurants should be located in areas of at least 200 ft2.
